text: Liyang Subdistrict () is a subdistrict and the county seat of Li County in Hunan, China. The subdistrict was the former Chengguan Town () established in 1950,the history of Liyang Town, according to the Dictionary of Chinese Administrative Divisions (中国行-政区划大典) published by the People's Publishing House of Zhejiang (浙江人民出版社) it was reorganized as a subdistrict in 2013. It has an area of with a population of 149,000 (as of 2017). It has 18 communities under its jurisdiction.li-xian.gov (2017-9-13) ==External links== * Official Website (Chinese / 中文) ==References== Category:Li County, Hunan Category:County seats in Hunan
title: Liyang Subdistrict, Li County
